title: BoolField should support docValues
description: It appears that BoolField does not support docvalues - but i can't think of any reason why three would be a fundemental limitation to supporting it – i think it's just an oversight we could remedy.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: If/when this gets added, "schema-sorts.xml" should be updated to include bool variants with docValues (SOLR-5920 is in process of adding BoolField to this file)
